alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Knox; Mahoning; Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 12:55PM EST until February 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation occurring. Additional snow and sleet accumulations of 3 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Holmes, Stark, Mahoning and Knox counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wintry mix of freezing rain, sleet, and snow will continue this afternoon before transitioning to snow by this evening. Snowfall rates of one half inch to one inch per hour are possible this evening. Low temperatures tonight will reach the lower teens and wind chill values as low as zero degrees are expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
